channel.title: INDC Talk: Top Ten Tips for Team Foundation Server
channel.description: Thanks to everyone that came along to my talk at the 2006 Irish National Developers Conference yesterday.  As it was Jedi Day, the session was appropriately aimed at being a deep-dive into some tips and tricks when using Team Foundation Server in the real...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Mickey Gousset+00:00
item.description: Dang, I wish I was several thousand miles closer so I could participate. That is some awesome content that you covered. Great Job!
item.dc:creator: Mickey Gousset

item.title: Comment by Jalil Abdollahi+00:00
item.description:
hi Martin I've got a question ... How can I let other clients Load my Project Portal in their browsers?
when they wanna try to load them ... it asks to enter user name and passwords... How can I remove this? and let them view my portal as an anonymous !!???
thanks for your great advices
sincerely yours
item.dc:creator: Jalil Abdollahi
